value.title: AI Ethics Welcomes The Prospects Of A Standardized AI Risk Management Framework, Which Could Bolster Autonomous Self-Driving Car Efforts Too
value.excerpt: AI Ethics is embracing the efforts to craft an AI Risk Management Framework (AI RMF) that is being formulated as a standard by the NIST, and which will likely aid the advent too of autonomous self-driving cars.

value.title: Storage requirements for AI, ML and analytics in 2022
value.excerpt: We look at what is needed for artificial intelligence and machine learning, and the pros and cons of block, file and object storage to store and access very large amounts of often unstructured data.

value.title: Tesla is aiming to start production of its Optimus humanoid robot in 2023
value.excerpt: Elon Musk gave a timeline to production for the first time for the Tesla Optimus project, a humanoid robot capable of doing general tasks. The CEO believes the company can bring the ambitious project to production as soon as next year.

value.title: FOCUS-Logistics giants hedge their bets in uncertain U.S. self-driving truck race
value.excerpt: U.S. self-driving truck companies have a golden opportunity in the form of a nationwide driver shortage, but their robot drivers still are not ready and neither are their biggest potential customers.

value.title: AI algorithms could disrupt our ability to think
value.excerpt: We already know AI-powered apps diminish our privacy. If they also diminish our human agency, that could have serious consequences.

value.title: The Dangers Of Not Aligning Artificial Intelligence With Human Values

value.title: Waymo expanding self-driving car operations to Downtown Phoenix
value.excerpt: On March 30, officials with Waymo announce they are expanding their self-driving car operations in Phoenix, years after they began self-driving car operations in a part of the East Valley. FOX 10's Linda Williams reports.

value.title: Waymo begins fully driverless robotaxi rides in SF
value.excerpt: Waymo has started giving fully driverless robotaxi rides to its employees in San Francisco. The company also announced its plan to open up its robotaxi service in downtown Phoenix. This morning, an all-electric Jaguar I-PACE picked up a Waymo engineer on their way to work.

value.title: Artificial intelligence really isn’t all that intelligent
value.excerpt: Narrow AI applications such as Google Search and Amazon Alexa are great at solving specific problems, but only as long as you stick to the script.

value.title: Crafting Ethical AI That Monitors Unethical AI And Tries To Deter Bad AI From Acting Up, Useful Even For Exalted AI-Based Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Let's use Ethical AI to oversee unethical AI, though this can be tricky and care is needed, which is illustrated via examples in the advent of AI-based self-driving cars.
